ing.item: Unpeeled red eating apples; coarsely chopped (3 cups)

directions.step:
1. Mix mayonnaise, lemon juice and milk in medium bowl.
2. Stir in apples, celery and nuts. Serve on salad greens. Cover and refrigerate any remaining salad.
1 Serving: 310 calories (260 calories from fat); 29 g fat (4 g saturated); 15 mg cholesterol; 180 mg sodium; 14 g carbohydrate (3 g dietary fiber); 1 g protein.
